Title: License to Wed
Writer: Kim Barker (screenplay), Tim Rasmussen (screenplay), Vince Di Meglio (screenplay), Kim Barker (story), Wayne Lloyd (story)
Actors: Robin Williams, Mandy Moore, John Krasinski, Eric Christian Olsen
Plot: A reverend puts an engaged couple through a grueling marriage preparation course to see if they are meant to be married in his church.
Production: Phoenix Pictures, Village Roadshow Entertainment, Robert Simonds Productions, Warner Bros.
